result.arabic_text: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ
result.translation: 26. Koros Racmaan kinni Rabbi xaylo hay site itte, Malayka Kay say-xayló axcuk, Yalli tohuk saytunnooweh, wonna hinna usun (Malayka kinnuk) Yallih naqoosay Yalli yessekexxee kinni.
